attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ramblers wish to have the right to shoot at will all off road motor bikers and 4*4 drivers that infringe on our piece and quite in our countryside. We also reserve the right to shoot anyone else who we wish that doesn’t do what we want.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
